message: Hi Bob, let's split this fairly. I think this is a good deal for both of us considering the time constraint!

Hi Alice, I think your initial offer was quite unbalanced in your favor. Given that I'm affected by 10% inflation each round, I'm proposing a more equitable split. This gives you a substantial $400000 while recognizing my time pressure. I hope we can agree and avoid further delays that would reduce the value for me.
Bob, I understand inflation hurts us both. To show good faith, I'm increasing your share. Let's finalize this quickly so we both get something substantial.
